welcome.name: Hi, I'm Yegor
welcome.desc1: I turn lines of code into new possibilities and unexpected discoveries. During working hours, I build reliable desktop applications in C# and .NET for the medical field; in my free time, I experiment with different languages and frameworks in personal projects just for fun. I love diving into new things, sometimes even a bit too much. Besides coding, I enjoy gaming, experimenting with AI, philosophical conversations, and self-improvement in the most unexpected areas.
welcome.desc2: UPD: Currently not in IT - serving in the country’s Defense forces.

projects.title: Projects
projects.intro1: Programming for me is more than just a job - it's a chance to experiment and bring my ideas to life. I enjoy creating projects that can be useful not only for myself, but for others too.
projects.intro2: Below are my projects. Each one is a new experience and an opportunity to learn something interesting. I don’t show everything, but what you see here is part of my journey.
projects.intro3: I’d be happy to chat, exchange ideas, or work on something together - it's always more fun as a team!
